name: Tide of Death
flavor: Teach them the folly of lining up for you.

metadata.flavor: Teach them the folly of lining up for you.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You move up to your speed in a straight line, and enemy squares are not difficult terrain for this movement. You can end this movement in a creature's space and move them to an adjacent unoccupied space. You make one power roll that targets each enemy whose space you move through.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The last target you damage takes extra damage equal to your Might score for each opportunity attack you trigger during your move.
